auth.reset-password-success: Success! Check your email for a reset link.
auth.reset-password-desc: Enter your email to reset your password

firebase-errors.auth/invalid-email: The email address is not valid!
firebase-errors.auth/user-not-found: There is no user with this email!
firebase-errors.auth/email-already-in-use: There already exists an account with the given email address!
firebase-errors.auth/weak-password: The password is not strong enough!
